summary: This mod can prevent the player ragdoll from bouncing ridiculously far away or sliding forever down a hill.  This can happen when you fall and hit the ground too hard, hit the ground on a slope or anytime your ragdoll is called into the game and a strong havok force is applied to the ragdoll.
descriptionHtml:
This is entry is obsolete.

When I first upload the mod I turned off the comments, this then AUTOMATICALLY turns off the endorsements.
Per Nexus rules it is impossible to change this without first deleting the entry and starting a new one. 


NEW ENTRY FOR THIS MOD GO HERE:  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65117/?
author: Duke Patrick aka SpookyFX-com
